channel.title: ToolBar Help?
channel.description: Hi i was screwing around and i messed something Up..you know when you open a page at the bottom of the screen so see a box but mine dont have that anymore when i open a new BOX See [img]http://img68.imageshack.us/img68/9909/dfgtw6.png[/img]

item.title: ToolBar Help?
item.dc:creator: @ThAt0n36Uy Elijah
item.description:
@ThAt0n36Uy wrote:

Prepares to make the general Tech Support Answer

“Did you restart your computer?” If you haven’t, try restarting, if it still doesn’t work you might should try moving the toolbar to the left side of the screen or the top. Like Speljohan said (Just making it dumber for the rest of us). If it still doesn’t appear I would suggest changing the theme, or possibly going in to Registry Editor and fix it from there if nothing else works.

Read full topic

item.title: ToolBar Help?
item.dc:creator: @Gotta_Catch_Them_All Gotta Catch Them All
item.description:
@Gotta_Catch_Them_All wrote:

[quote=“VB7 Rocks, post:3, topic:150412”][quote author=Gotta Catch Them All link=topic=205956.msg1814663#msg1814663 date=1192040383]
What do you mean? Did you have links in that little box?
[/quote]

No. Look at the picture he posted. Tell me what’s wrong with it: (Think, he has a window open, and then look at the taskbar)

[/quote]

Oops. Sorry, I didn’t notice the page open.

Edit:I googled around and checked a few settings but I can’t find an answer, sorry.

Read full topic

item.title: ToolBar Help?
item.dc:creator: @Speljohan Speljohan
item.description:
@Speljohan wrote:

It’s probably some alignment thing. Try mess around with the toolbar until they re-appear.

Read full topic

item.title: ToolBar Help?
item.dc:creator: @InfoManiac InfoManiac
item.description:
@InfoManiac wrote:

Open task manager
End explorer.exe
Click File>New Task
Type explorer
/win

Read full topic

item.title: ToolBar Help?
item.dc:creator: @MastrChief MastrChief
item.description:
@MastrChief wrote:

h44ckzor pwnage:

Right click the Task Bar and click “Lock The Taskbar”

Learn to read.

What changes did you make?

Have you tried a system restore?

Read full topic

item.title: ToolBar Help?
item.dc:creator: @VB7_Rocks VB7 Rocks
item.description:
@VB7_Rocks wrote:

Gotta Catch Them All:

What do you mean? Did you have links in that little box?

No. Look at the picture he posted. Tell me what’s wrong with it: (Think, he has a window open, and then look at the taskbar)

Read full topic

item.title: ToolBar Help?
item.dc:creator: @Gotta_Catch_Them_All Gotta Catch Them All
item.description:
@Gotta_Catch_Them_All wrote:

What do you mean? Did you have links in that little box?

If you did here is how to fix it:
Right click the task bar, go up to tool bars and tick Quick Launch. Then right click again and tick lock task bar.

Read full topic
